attributes.action: Give our soldiers  and the familys better living accomdation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of British soldiers are living in squalor at damp, poorly 
maintained barracks with leaking roofs, broken windows, faulty heating, 
potentially dangerous wiring and blocked lavatories.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Give our soldiers and the familys better living accomdation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14195.asp

Prime Minister's Office
